summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5937 for the improvement of 34th Avenue Southwest, from West Roxbury Street to West Barton Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78613, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
